Html:
Hi,

 

In the program I'm writing, I'd like to be able to show only specific bones (or move them) of a model depending on some variables (in this case if certain markers are visible). And I would like to accomplish this with the GoblinXNA model class if possible because of how well it works with the rest of GoblinXNA, is there a way to do this?

Thanks for your time

You probably want to write your own class that extends the existing GoblinXNA Model class to do that. It is definitely possible, but we don't have a support for that since we never needed it for our research.

Ohan
